English: You haven't seen them yet, have you?
Korean: 아직 둘과 만나지 못한 것 같네?
German: Du hast sie noch nicht gesehen, oder?

English: They were still fighting as usual...
Chinese: 他們還是一如往常地不停吵架……
German: Sie haben sich immer noch gestritten, wie üblich.

English:
As soon as they saw me, they started asking whose
side I'm on.
Chinese:
我只要見到他們，
就一直被問「你到底站在誰那邊」。
Korean:
나는 얼굴만 봤다 하면
「누구 편이냐」는 말만 들어
German:
Sobald sie mich gesehen haben, haben sie gefragt,
auf wessen Seite ich stehe.

English: They used to be such good friends...
Chinese:
至今為止明明就處得很好，
究竟為什麼會變成這樣……
German: Sie waren früher so gut befreundet ...

Chinese:
總之請盡快！
趕快去見見看他們。

English: I'm sure they're still going at it.
Chinese:
看來在你要前往的地方，
他們倆還在吵架。
Korean:
아무래도 네가 있는 너머에서
둘은 아직 싸우고 있는 것 같아
German: Ich bin mir sicher, sie sind immer noch dabei.

English: You're my only hope. Please help!
Chinese:
我只能交給你了……
萬事拜託了！
Korean:
나는 너한테 맡길 수밖에 없으니까……
부디 잘 부탁드립니다!
German: Du bist meine einzige Hoffnung. Bitte hilf mir!
